title: Speedy chilli turkey stir-fry
description: A speedy one-pan which packs a punch, this turkey stir-fry is a fail-safe option for a quick, easy-to-make midweek dinner.

method.Step 1: Heat a splash of oil in a large frying pan or wok over a high heat. Add 500g British free-range turkey thigh mince and cook, stirring, for 4-5 minutes until beginning to brown.

method.Step 2: Add 1 grated carrot and 200g tenderstem broccoli to the pan/wok and cook for 3 minutes more.

method.Step 3: Stir in 1 chopped garlic clove, 2cm piece fresh ginger, finely chopped, and ½ chopped red chilli, then cook for a minute more. Add 40g chilli jam/sweet chilli sauce to the wok/pan with 1 tbsp soy sauce, then fry for 4 minutes more until the mince is starting to brown and crisp.

method.Step 4: Scatter with sesame seeds, sliced spring onions and fresh coriander. Serve with lime wedges and basmati rice or baked potatoes.
